title: Dandelion, The Extraordinary Life of a Misfit
description: An uplifting tale for every age that will have you guessing at what becomes of this lost, rebellious soul, until you breathe a sigh of relief, shed a tear of joy, and remember that trusting life is half the secret. This adventurous little horse, who with a little perseverance, patience, and faith, makes a stunning success of her life, will no doubt remind you of yourself.
author: Sheelagh Mawe
